categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname
Category:Imperial Navy pilots of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: PS-29-3, also known as "Hammer," was a male TIE pilot in the Imperial Navy during the Galactic Civil War. PS-29-3 flew under the call sign Shadow Three in the Imperial Shadow wing. He recorded the highest score in academy TIE fighter simulator drills, a fact that caught Admiral Conan Antonio Motti's attention. PS-29-3's starfighter had a command system capable of coordinating the combined power of the entire Shadow wing. He wore a black TIE pilot jumpsuit and helmet, and had designs on being the leading pilot of Shadow wing.
PS-29-3 was created for a card in the Premiere set of Decipher's 2001 Jedi Knights Trading Card Game, with his name simultaneously being used in the gameplay text of a second card in the set.
